item.title: MTB Annual Trade Based Financial Compliance Conference-2025
item.description: Mutual Trust Bank PLC (MTB) arranged the Annual Trade Based Compliance Conference 2025 on December 6, 2025 to create awareness on key deliverables for prevention of Trade Based Money Laundering. The conference was held for MTB Officials relevant to Trade Servicing from Branches and Corporate Head

item.title: PBI finds evidence of ‘fraud’ against Toyota executives
item.description: The Police Bureau of Investigation (PBI) has found evidence of alleged fraudulent activities involving three senior Toyota Bangladesh executives, including Managing Director Premmit Singh. Earlier this month, the probe report was submitted to the Chief Metropolitan Magistrate Court in Dhaka by PBI

item.title: Mercantile Bank holds cash management training in Ctg
item.description: Mercantile Bank PLC organised a day-long “Cash Management” training workshop in Chattogram on Saturday (20/12/2025) to strengthen operational efficiency and enhance professional competence among its cash officers. Head of Training & Development of Mercantile Bank S. M. Salim Uddin atte

item.title: Inauguration of Chatkhil branch of Citizens Bank
item.description: Mr. Alamgir Hossain, Managing Director, Citizens Bank PLC, formally inaugurated Chatkhil Branch at Noakhalion on December 22, 2025, in the presence of Deputy Managing Directors Mr. Md. Mostafizur Rahman and Mr. Md. Abdul Latif and other high officials of the bank. Among others, local renowned busi

item.title: 11 more arrested over Prothom Alo, Daily Star attacks
item.description: Police have arrested 11 more people over attacks, vandalism, and arson at the offices of Prothom Alo and The Daily Star in Dhaka. The Detective Branch arrested nine suspects across the capital on Monday, while Tejgaon Police held two others, according to a media statement issued by the Dhaka Metro

item.title: NCP backs restoring political rights of ordinary AL supporters: Nahid
item.description: National Citizen Party (NCP) Convener Nahid Islam on Tuesday said his party supports restoring the civic and political rights of ordinary supporters of Awami League. “Those who support a fascist party may have committed a moral crime, but if they were not involved in mass killings during the

item.title: Miscreants call man out of home, cut off his wrists in Khulna
item.description: Miscreants have cut off the wrists of a man in Khulna’s Batiaghata, police say. The incident occurred on Tuesday morning at Darogar Bhita Ali Nagar, Batiaghata Police chief Khandakar Hafizur Rahman said. The miscreants went to the victim’s house and called him out before severing his

item.title: Neymar undergoes successful knee surgery
item.description: Neymar has undergone successful arthroscopic surgery on his knee, his club Santos said on Monday, as the winger bids to get back to full fitness and earn a place in the Brazil squad for next year's World Cup. The 33-year-old returned to his childhood club Santos in January and played a key role in

item.title: Russian air attack on Ukraine kills three and sparks sweeping outages
item.description: Russian missile and drone attacks killed at least three Ukrainians including a child on Tuesday, triggering widespread emergency power cuts and prompting neighbouring Poland to scramble jets. The attacks, days after another round of U.S.-led talks to end the nearly four-year-old war, hit energy fa

item.title: Bangladesh separates trade from politics in managing ties with India: Finance adviser
item.description: Finance Adviser Dr Salehuddin Ahmed on Tuesday said Bangladesh manages its relationship with India by clearly separating economic interests from political rhetoric, stressing that trade decisions are guided by competitiveness and national interest rather than diplomatic sensitivities. “Our t

item.title: Pay rise for primary headteachers
item.description: The government has raised the salaries of headteachers at government primary schools to grade 10, granting them the rank of gazetted officers. The Ministry of Primary and Mass Education moved their pay one step up from grade 11, according to a media statement on Tuesday. The new pay scale will be

item.title: NRBC Bank holds workshop on reporting under Bangladesh Bank’s online monitoring system
item.description: NRBC Bank organized a workshop on Reporting to Online Import Monitoring System (OIMS) and Online Export Monitoring System (OEMS) introduced by Bangladesh Bank, according to a press release.
